# FWSAkRDRtools

File Management Tools for the Fish & Wildlife Service Alaska Regional
Data Repository

## Installation

You can install the development version of FWSAkRDRtools from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# Install devtools from CRAN
install.packages("devtools")

# Install FWSAkRDRtools from GitHub
devtools::install_github("hdvincelette/FWSAkRDRtools")
```

## Getting help

Submit a [GitHub
Issue](https://github.com/hdvincelette/FWSAkRDRtools/issues) to report a
bug and request a feature or enhancement. Contact the [project
maintainer](https://github.com/hdvincelette) for information about
contributing to this project.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`clone.project()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/clone.project.md)
  : Clone a project from the USFWS Alaska Regional Data Repository (RDR)
- [`commit.files()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/commit.files.md)
  : Commit files to the "incoming" project subfolder on the USFWS Alaska
  Regional Data Repository (RDR)
- [`download.files()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/download.files.md)
  : Download project file(s) from the USFWS Alaska Regional Data
  Repository (RDR)
- [`find.files()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/find.files.md)
  : Find the location(s) of project file(s) on the USFWS Alaska Regional
  Data Repository (RDR)
- [`find.projects()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/find.projects.md)
  : Find projects on the USFWS Alaska Regional Data Repository (RDR)
- [`get.contacts()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/get.contacts.md)
  : Get contacts from an mdEditor metadata file
- [`get.dir.template()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/get.dir.template.md)
  : Get the USFWS Alaska Regional Data Repository (RDR) project
  directory tree template.
- [`read.tables()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/read.tables.md)
  : Read a tabular project file on the USFWS Alaska Regional Data
  Repository (RDR) into R
- [`scrape.mdEditor()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/scrape.mdEditor.md)
  : Scrape metadata from an mdEditor metadata file
- [`summarize.files()`](https://hdvincelette.github.io/FWSAkRDRtools/reference/summarize.files.md)
  : Summarize project files on the USFWS Alaska Regional Data Repository
  (RDR)
